duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure operational efficiency, member/guest experience, staff retention and optimal profit at Soho House & Co. properties.
Be an ambassador for the Soho House brand and fully embrace the ethos, support staff, member and guest experience.
Partner with the Executive Chef, Head of Operations, and COO to develop strategic business objectives and goals.
Assess the business on a weekly/daily basis and provide reports on the economic and operational state of the business.
Collaborate with Health & Safety leaders and ensure compliance with local, government, and regional standards.
Guide, develop, and implement decisions to improve business operations, service, retention, and overall experience.
Provide leadership relative to annual marketing plans and partnership with other leaders within Membership, Marketing, Food & Drink, and Finance.
Oversee the creation, collaboration, execution, and planning of regional properties and events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
